DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare QVAR-Easi-Breathe 100 mcg/day QVAR-Easi-Breathe 200 mcg/day placebo relative change force expiratory volume 1 second ( FEV1 ) result follow 12 week treatment . Secondary objective daily asthma symptom score ( per week ) , morning peak expiratory flow ( PEF ) value , nocturnal awaken utilization rescue medication per day also evaluate . In addition , exploratory evaluation assess comparability two device ( i.e. , QVAR-Easi-Breathe versus QVAR-MDI ) dose level .
